transcripts.text: If you want freedom, take pride in your country.  If you want democracy, hold on to your sovereignty.  And if you want peace, love your nation.  Mr.  Gorbachev teared down this wall.  Do you believe in miracles?  Yes!  Wise leaders always put the good of their own people and their own country first.  The future does not belong to globalists.  The future belongs to patriots.
